other-references: 1. Blonk et al. 2008 Milieueffecten van Nederlandse consumptie van eiwitrijke producten. Blonk Milieu Advies in opdracht van VROM -> page 16, table 3.1 =  16.3 kg CO2/kg, not sure if the CO2-end value is on filet or on the complete fish.
references: Buchspies, Tölle, Jungbluth 2011. Life Cycle Assessment of High-Sea Fish and Salmon Aquaculture. Page 16, Fig. 4.7 lamb 12.5 kgCO2e/kg
name: Lammfleisch
comments: Lamb meat lower or higher than beef? Buchspies 2011, lower, Blonk 2008 it is higher
